Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Small parts | Not for children under 3 yrs.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on uninflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required | Keep uninflated balloons from children. Discard broken balloons at once.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – This toy is a small ball | Not for children under 3 yrs.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Toy contains a small ball | Not for children under 3 yrs.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – This toy is a marble | Not for children under 3 yrs.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD – Toy contains a marble | Not for children under 3 yrs.
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US

Heading: No choking hazard warning necessary
Note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

Heading: WARNING: MAGNET HAZARD – Product contains (a) small magnet(s)
Note: Required on applicable products sold in the US. Should be accompanied by additional text: Swallowed magnets can stick together across intestines causing serious infections and death. Seek immediate medical attention if magnet(s) are swallowed or inhaled

Heading: No magnet hazard warning necessary
Note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

Heading: WARNING – Flashing hazard
Note: Product flashes, flickers or includes high-contrast static or moving patterns which may cause discomfort or seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy

Heading: No flashing hazard warning necessary
Note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product

Heading: WARNING – California Proposition 65 carcinogenic, teratogenic or other reproductively harmful chemical hazard
Note: Required on applicable products sold in California. Must be accompanied in <ProductFormFeatureDescription> by specific additional text as displayed on product or packaging. For example, “WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including [chemical name], which is known to the State of California to cause cancer. For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov”. Note long-form warnings should be used here, even if a short form warning is used on the product or packaging

Heading: No California Proposition 65 hazard warning necessary
Note: To be used when a supplier wishes to make a clear statement that no such warning is applicable to product
